goal.ch: ※此課程為理學院「量子技術」學分學程之新訂必修課程。//教師預期學生在修習本課程後之學習學程，或學生應有的專業表現。強調學生修習此門課程後可展現的具體能力。本課程旨在介紹了解量子科技所需之背景知識、原理、相關研究與技術進展及其應用等，對於欲學習量子科學與技術有興趣的學生具有啟發及引導後續進階課程修習之助益。
goal.en: This course is meant to introduce the background knowledge, principles, related research and technological advancements, as well as applications, necessary for understanding quantum technology. The course also provides inspiration and guidance for students interested in learning quantum science and technology, and assists them in subsequent advanced courses.

outline.ch: 本課程包含以下主題：1. 同調量子光學與量子干涉(兩週)2. 量子光源介紹(兩週)3. 量子記憶體簡介(兩週)4. 糾纏光子整形及調控(兩週)5. 應用於量子光學的半導體光偵測器介紹(一至兩週)6. 量子通訊協定簡介(一至兩週)7. 超導量子電路簡介(兩週)8. 量子演算法與量子網際網路(兩週)9. 拓樸能帶論與拓樸光子學簡介(兩週)
outline.en: This course includes the following topics.1. Coherent transit and quantum interference (two weeks)2. Introduction to Quantum Light Sources (two weeks)3. Introduction to Quantum memory (two weeks)4. Shaping of entangled photons(two weeks)5. Introduction to semiconductor based photodetectors for quantum photonics (1 to 2 weeks)6. Introduction to quantum communication protocol (1 to 2 weeks)7. Introduction to superconducting quantum circuits (two weeks)8.Quantum algorithms and quantum Internet (two weeks)9. Introduction to topological band theory and topological photonics(two weeks)
